name: Snapshot Labs
description: Snapshot is a voting platform that allows DAOs, DeFi protocols, or NFT communities to vote easily and without gas fees.   The tool allows high customization of the voting process to cater to the diverse needs of the users and organizations. Customization includes different aspects like calculation of the users' voting power, selection of the voting mechanism, proposal and vote validation, and many more.  In short, Snapshot is an off-chain gasless multi-governance client which results are easy to verify and hard to contest.
